pr_title: Improve confusing log message when reconciling custom resources

timeline.message:
Improve confusing log message when reconciling custom resources

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
log.info("{}: {} {} should be checked for creation or update", reconciliation, kind, name);
log.info("{}: {} {} will be checked for creation or modification", reconciliation, kind, name);
timeline.author: tombentley

timeline.message:
Update operator-common/src/main/java/io/strimzi/operator/common/AbstractOperator.java

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>
